title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - From Punch Cards to Pair Programming and Beyond: The Future of Copilot (AIM294)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从打孔卡到结对编程及更远：Copilot 的未来 (AIM294)
abstract: In this session, we look at the history of tools for boosting developer productivity from punch cards through IDEs and into AI Pair Programming. GitHub Copilot Code completions started the revolution in 2021, but that already feels like the Stone Age! As autonomous agentic workloads grow in popularity, this session will help guide where Copilot is headed and what should you be doing to prepare yourself for the (imminent) future of Agentic Software Delivery. This presentation is brought to you by GitHub, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 在本次会议中，我们将回顾从打孔卡到集成开发环境（IDE）再到AI结对编程等提升开发者生产力的工具发展历史。GitHub Copilot代码补全功能在2021年掀起了这场革命，但现在看来那已经像是石器时代！随着自主代理工作负载日益普及，本次会议将帮助指引Copilot的发展方向，以及您应该如何为代理软件交付的（即将到来的）未来做好准备。本演讲由AWS合作伙伴GitHub提供。
